amendment.description: An amendment numbered 8 printed in Part B of House Report 116-19 to require the Department of Labor to conduct a study on the gender pay gap in the teenage workforce and provide recommendations for how to address the gap.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lawrence amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A007) offered by Mrs. Lawrence.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Lawrence amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.
